# braintrustdata_orgs (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust organizations using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List organizations with optional filters.
data "braintrustdata_orgs" "all" {}

data "braintrustdata_orgs" "filtered" {
  org_name = "example-org"
  limit    = 10
}

output "organization_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_orgs.filtered.ids
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch organizations before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of organizations to return.
- `org_name` (String) Optional exact organization name filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch organizations after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) List of returned organization IDs.
- `orgs` (Attributes List) List of organizations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--orgs))

<a id="nestedatt--orgs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `orgs`

Read-Only:

- `api_url` (String) The API URL for organization-scoped endpoints.
- `created` (String) The timestamp when the organization was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the organization.
- `image_rendering_mode` (String) Image rendering behavior in Braintrust UI.
- `is_dataplane_private` (Boolean) Whether dataplane access is private for this organization.
- `is_universal_api` (Boolean) Whether the organization uses universal API routing.
- `name` (String) The organization name.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID.
- `proxy_url` (String) The proxy URL used by this organization.
- `realtime_url` (String) The realtime websocket URL used by this organization.
